comments: The best micro professor ever, makes hard material understandable and wants his students to well in the course, it\'s a hard course so you need to study but he does everything in his power to make it as easy as possible, take him!

tag_professor: Caring (4)  Hilarious (3)  Clear grading criteria (3)  Gives good feedback (2)  Respected (1)  TEST HEAVY (1)
comments: great professor for micro, 3 exams and a final. lab has 3 test and 1 lab report. tells you what to study for the tests.. overall great teacher. Need to study the material, not an easy class but if you need this class as a pre req take him!

tag_professor: Caring (4)  Hilarious (3)  Clear grading criteria (3)  Gives good feedback (2)  Respected (1)  TEST HEAVY (1)
stu_tags: CLEAR GRADING CRITERIA  CARING  GIVES GOOD FEEDBACK
comments: He makes a tough class somewhat enjoyable. He\'s extremely passionate about this course and goes off topic a lot. But he\'s very clear on what he will be testing you on. His tests are based off his powerpoints and anything he adds to them in lecture. Put the effort into studying and you will do well. Drops your lowest test grade as well.

tag_professor: Caring (4)  Hilarious (3)  Clear grading criteria (3)  Gives good feedback (2)  Respected (1)  TEST HEAVY (1)
comments: Schmidt is the bomb dot com! His lectures are clear and precise, he genuinely cares about every student and he is accessible & accomodating. Amazingly, he makes it possible for all types of students to not only excel in his class but also to learn a thing or two about micro, a topic and he is deeply enamored with. Plus he\'s cool. Great class!

tag_professor: Caring (4)  Hilarious (3)  Clear grading criteria (3)  Gives good feedback (2)  Respected (1)  TEST HEAVY (1)
comments: If you want an amazing professor who knows what he\'s talking about and genuinely cares for students he\'s the man. I wish he taught more science courses. He\'s very approachable and clear. The course itself is tough however study & take good notes and you\'ll be golden. Getting a great grade and enjoying the course is much easier than you think.

tag_professor: Caring (4)  Hilarious (3)  Clear grading criteria (3)  Gives good feedback (2)  Respected (1)  TEST HEAVY (1)
comments: Don\'t buy the textbook unless he tells you otherwise in class. The course is inherently difficult, but he will clarify a lot on the slides within lecture. Even though lecture is optional, those who do not attend will have lower grades than those who do. Overall, Dr. Schmidt is a great professor. You won\'t regret having him.

tag_professor: Caring (4)  Hilarious (3)  Clear grading criteria (3)  Gives good feedback (2)  Respected (1)  TEST HEAVY (1)
comments: Awesome Professor! Very knowledgeable. Very helpful. Sunny disposition. This is not an easy class - you have to study, but you won\'t regret picking this Professor.

tag_professor: Caring (4)  Hilarious (3)  Clear grading criteria (3)  Gives good feedback (2)  Respected (1)  TEST HEAVY (1)
comments: Schmidt is great. Very helpful, very encouraging. Wants you to pass Micro!

tag_professor: Caring (4)  Hilarious (3)  Clear grading criteria (3)  Gives good feedback (2)  Respected (1)  TEST HEAVY (1)
comments: Professor Schmidt is a very nice guy! Tests are easy as long as you understand the powerpoints and are able to relate them to \'scenarios\'. Lab is also very straight forward. 3 lecture exams (drops lowest), a final, and 3 lab practicals. Definitely recommend him !

tag_professor: Caring (4)  Hilarious (3)  Clear grading criteria (3)  Gives good feedback (2)  Respected (1)  TEST HEAVY (1)
comments: Professor Schmidt is amazing!! He is very helpful and teaches the material in a way for all to grasp. He is very funny. Don\'t bother buying the textbook, straight power point :) If you just focus on his pp slides, you will ace his exams. He also gives hints during lecture on specifics to know for the exam so attending lecture will help greatly

tag_professor: Caring (4)  Hilarious (3)  Clear grading criteria (3)  Gives good feedback (2)  Respected (1)  TEST HEAVY (1)
comments: Professor Schmidt is a terrific professor. Very nice, helpful and wants you to do well. His tests are fair. Lectures are interesting and informative. I learned a lot.

tag_professor: Caring (4)  Hilarious (3)  Clear grading criteria (3)  Gives good feedback (2)  Respected (1)  TEST HEAVY (1)
comments: He\'s a superb professor. Take him! Lectures are interesting and tests are not difficult. I have nothing but good things to say about this man.

tag_professor: Caring (4)  Hilarious (3)  Clear grading criteria (3)  Gives good feedback (2)  Respected (1)  TEST HEAVY (1)
comments: 1. you will never open your textbook once. don\'t buy it. 2. he\'s very nice and helpful, willing to go the extra mile to explain complicated topics. 3. tests are not "easy" but straightforward, not tricky, and if you study his powerpts. you will do well. an A is definitely attainable without having to kill yourself with studying.

tag_professor: Caring (4)  Hilarious (3)  Clear grading criteria (3)  Gives good feedback (2)  Respected (1)  TEST HEAVY (1)

Very friendly, enjoys teaching. Imparts material in most efficient way possible. Never makes u feel stupid! Uses power point.Lecture tests from the slides. Lab exams clear-cut.

comments: Love this professor,class was very uderstandable thanks to him. Exams were multiple choice and straight from power points. He really made lecture and lab fun would definitely say take this class

tag_professor: Caring (4)  Hilarious (3)  Clear grading criteria (3)  Gives good feedback (2)  Respected (1)  TEST HEAVY (1)
comments: I truly enjoyed his class. Professor schmidt is the most fun and makes his micro class enjoyable. Lecture exams were multiple choice and not tricky. Lab exams were short answers and some matching but very doable.. Definitely would recommend this class to everyone to take.. Clss ends next week and I am sad to see to end.

tag_professor: Caring (4)  Hilarious (3)  Clear grading criteria (3)  Gives good feedback (2)  Respected (1)  TEST HEAVY (1)
comments: Best Science teacher at sccc. Micro is a hard class and he made the class easy to follow. I would highly recommend him.This was my second time taking this class. I wish I would have heard about him sooner. I got an A!

tag_professor: Caring (4)  Hilarious (3)  Clear grading criteria (3)  Gives good feedback (2)  Respected (1)  TEST HEAVY (1)
comments: He is a great guy who will help anyone who seeks it. There is a lot to learn and he spells it out in a way that is very organized. I only had him for lab and the exams are fill in the blank, short essay and some matching so you have to know your stuff. He is the youngest guy there so he can relate to the students. I would not hesitate to take him.

tag_professor: Caring (4)  Hilarious (3)  Clear grading criteria (3)  Gives good feedback (2)  Respected (1)  TEST HEAVY (1)
comments: Schmidt was great. Very fun and makes class go by as quickly as possible. Loves to interact with students. He gives all the information needed. I will admit that it is a lot of info, but based on what I hear about the other professors that teach this course- you\'d be lucky to have schmidt!
